title: How can I prepare now to become a righteous husband and father?
short_title: How can I prepare now to become a righteous husband and father?
content: How can I prepare now to become a righteous husband and father?
“By divine design, fathers are to preside over their families in love and righteousness and are responsible to provide the necessities of life and protection for their families” (“
The Family: A Proclamation to the World

Nov. 2010, 129). We can prepare for these responsibilities by faithfully fulfilling our priesthood duties, learning how to receive personal revelation, loving and serving our families now, gaining an education, and learning how to work.

The Savior loved, prayed for, and continually served His disciples. He knew their interests, hopes, desires, and what was happening in their lives. What do you know about the young men you are serving? What can you do to help them become righteous husbands and fathers in the future?

Ask the quorum members to share in pairs something they remember from last week’s lesson.

Ask them to write down a description of the kind of husbands and fathers they want to be. Invite them to share what they wrote if they would like to. Encourage them to add to their descriptions throughout the lesson.
